Use SIC code or industry title text search to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

Source: R/sic_xyz.R
frs_from_sic.Rd

Use SIC code or industry title text search to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

Usage

frs_from_sic(sic_code_or_name, ...)

Arguments

...

passed to naics_from_any()

naics_code_or_name

Value

relevant rows of the data.table called frs, which has column names that are "lat" "lon" "REGISTRY_ID" "PRIMARY_NAME" "NAICS" "SIC" "PGM_SYS_ACRNMS"

See also

regid_from_sic() sic_from_any()

Examples

  frs_from_sic("glass")
#> Connecting to Posit Connect ??? at <https://rstudio-connect.dmap-stage.aws.epa.gov>
#> Failed trying to connect to pins board server.
#> 
#> frs_by_sic   - is NOT in memory. Checking local disk... frs_by_sic  is loading from ~/../Downloads/EJAMbigfiles/frs_by_sic.arrow ...done.
#> frs_by_sic   - was loaded from local folder, so server copy was not sought.
#>

  mapfast(frs_from_sic(sic_from_any("silver")$code))


  sic_from_any("silver")
#>    code n2  n3   n4                                 name                                    num_name
#> 1: 1040 10 104 1040                 Gold and silver ores                 1040 - Gold and silver ores
#> 2: 1044 10 104 1044                          Silver ores                          1044 - Silver ores
#> 3: 3910 39 391 3910 Jewelry, silverware, and plated ware 3910 - Jewelry, silverware, and plated ware
#> 4: 3914 39 391 3914           Silverware and plated ware           3914 - Silverware and plated ware
  sic_from_name("silver")
#>    code n2  n3   n4                                 name                                    num_name
#> 1: 1040 10 104 1040                 Gold and silver ores                 1040 - Gold and silver ores
#> 2: 1044 10 104 1044                          Silver ores                          1044 - Silver ores
#> 3: 3910 39 391 3910 Jewelry, silverware, and plated ware 3910 - Jewelry, silverware, and plated ware
#> 4: 3914 39 391 3914           Silverware and plated ware           3914 - Silverware and plated ware
  sic_from_any('0780')
#>    code n2  n3   n4                                 name                                    num_name
#> 1: 0780 07 078 0780 Landscape and horticultural services 0780 - Landscape and horticultural services
  frs_from_sic('0780')
#>         lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID                   PRIMARY_NAME  NAICS              SIC

  regid_from_sic('0780')
#>         lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID  SIC
#> 1: 34.01928 -118.06651 110002942059 0780
#> 2: 39.46249  -75.31125 110032015067 0780
#> 3: 40.56092  -74.55954 110032369568 0780
#> 4: 39.76020  -75.38356 110032373036 0780
#> 5: 38.51118 -121.35022 110065267570 0780
#> 6: 40.15182 -124.08750 110065281572 0780
  latlon_from_sic('0780')
#>         lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID  SIC
#> 1: 34.01928 -118.06651 110002942059 0780
#> 2: 39.46249  -75.31125 110032015067 0780
